## Submit Your CKAN Site

Help grow the CKAN ecosystem! Submit your CKAN site to be featured on the catalog.

**Please fill out the required fields marked with * to help us process your submission.**

---

### * Email Address
<!-- We'll use this to contact you if we have questions -->


### Your Name (Optional)


### * Site Name
<!-- The name of your CKAN site/portal -->


### * Site URL
<!-- The URL of your CKAN instance -->


### * Description
<!-- Provide a brief description of your CKAN site. Include what data you publish, target audience, key features, and any other relevant information. -->


### * Organization
<!-- The organization or entity that operates this CKAN site -->
<!-- e.g., City Government, Ministry of Health, Research Institute, etc. -->


### * Site Type
<!-- What type of CKAN site is this? (Check one) -->

- [ ] Government (National)
- [ ] Government (Regional/State)
- [ ] Government (Local/City)
- [ ] Research/Academic
- [ ] Non-Profit/NGO
- [ ] Private Sector
- [ ] International Organization
- [ ] Community/Open Data
- [ ] Other: 


### Country/Region (Optional)
<!-- Where is this CKAN site based? -->


### Data Categories/Domains (Optional)
<!-- What categories or domains of data does your site publish? (comma-separated) -->
<!-- e.g., Health, Transportation, Environment, Finance, Education -->


### Primary Language(s) (Optional)
<!-- What language(s) is your site available in? -->
<!-- e.g., English, Spanish, French, Arabic -->


### CKAN Version (Optional)
<!-- Which version of CKAN are you running? (Check one) -->

- [ ] CKAN 2.9
- [ ] CKAN 2.10
- [ ] CKAN 2.11
- [ ] CKAN 3.0
- [ ] Custom/Modified
- [ ] Not sure


### * Public Access
<!-- Is your CKAN site publicly accessible? (Check one) -->

- [ ] Yes - Fully Public
- [ ] No - Internal/Private Only

### API Access (Optional)
<!-- Is the CKAN API publicly accessible? Provide API documentation URL if available -->
